recipes.title: Cheese Sticks
recipes.name: cheese_sticks
preparation: Mix flour, grated cheese and butter, 2 yolks, sugar, salt, pepper, and knead dough
Put the dough into the fridge for 2 hours
Roll out the dough to about 5mm thick and cut out triangles or rectangles of needed size
Bake for 12-15 minutes

recipes.title: Chicken Breast with Cheese
recipes.name: chicken_breast_with_cheese
preparation: Mix oil and garlic in one bowl
Mix breadcrumbs, grated cheese and pepper in another bowl
Dip every piece of meat first in oil substance, then in the bowl with breadcrumbs
Bake for 30 minutes

recipes.title: Cheese Appetizer
recipes.name: cheese_appetizer
preparation: Grate cheese
Whisk chilled whites with a pinch of salt
Add cheese and pepper
Make balls and roll them in breadcrumbs (or flour)
Fry in a large amount of sunflower oil
Serve with parsley

recipes.title: Rice Cutlets
recipes.name: rice_cutlets
preparation: Grate cheese, cut onions in small pieces
Mix kefir, eggs, onions and cheese, add spices, and stir
Add boiled rice, stir
Put everything into the fridge for 2 hours
Then form cutlets, roll them in breadcrumbs and fry on both sides

recipes.title: Potato Croquettes
recipes.name: potato_croquettes
preparation: Boil potato in salty water and mash it
Add yolk, butter, flour, spices and stir
Make balls out of mashed potato
Whisk white
Roll balls in white, then in breadcrumbs
Fry balls in a large amount of sunflower oil until ready

recipes.title: Potato Zrazy
recipes.name: potato_zrazy
preparation: Boil potato and mash it
Add egg, salt, pepper, flour
Knead dough that doesn't stick to hands
Fry onion cut in small pieces and garlic
Add mincemeat, salt, pepper and fry until ready
Form pellets out of potato dough, put meat stuffing in the middle and unite the edge of pellets
Roll zrazy in breadcrumbs
Fry until ready
Serve with sour cream

recipes.title: Scrambled Eggs in Roll
recipes.name: scrambled_eggs_in_roll
preparation: Cut out the top of the roll and its inner part
Put the slice of bacon and egg inside each roll, add salt and pepper
Sprinkle grated cheese and dill over
Bake for 10 minutes

recipes.title: Chicken Pop-Corn
recipes.name: chicken_pop-corn
preparation: Cut fillet in pieces
Mix fillet, salt, pepper and spices in a bowl, leave for half an hour
Mix flour, pepper and some more spices in another bowl
Roll fillet in flour, then in cheese, then in flour again
Leave chicken for 10-15 minutes
Fry in a large amount of oil for 3-6 minutes
Serve with ketchup

recipes.title: Corn-Dog
recipes.name: corn-dog
preparation: Mix flour, sugar, baking soda, salt, pepper and spices, and stir thoroughly
Add egg and milk, and knead dense dough
Put sausages on sticks and roll in flour and dough
Fry in oil until batter becomes golden
Serve with ketchup or mustard

recipes.title: Lacy Pancakes
recipes.name: lacy_pancakes
preparation: Mix kefir, egg, sugar, salt and flour, and stir
In boiling water add baking soda, stir quickly and pour everything into dough
Stir everything again and let the dough stand for 10 minutes
Cook pancakes in greased frying pan

recipes.title: Cheese Pancakes
recipes.name: cheese_pancakes
preparation: Crumple cottage cheese with a fork, add sugar and egg, and stir
Form pancakes, roll them in flour on both sides
Fry over small heat until ready

recipes.title: Kiwi with Yoghurt and Biscuits
recipes.name: kiwi_with_yoghurt_and_biscuits
preparation: Peel and dice kiwis
Whisk yoghurt with sugar
Then put kiwis and yoghurt into a bowl, layer by layer
Strew cookies over

recipes.title: Julienne in Potato
recipes.name: julienne_in_potato
preparation: Wash potato but don't peel it
Cut every potato in 2 equal parts and using a spoon take out the inner part, leaving 5mm edges
Put got 'boats' in the water so that potato won't become dark
Melt butter in frying pan, fry mushrooms for 5-7 minutes in it
Add onion, flour, fresh cream, salt, pepper and fry for 3-4 minutes more
Stuff each 'boat' with a piece of butter and mushroom filling
Bake for 15 minutes
Sprinkle grated cheese over and bake for 15 minutes more

recipes.title: Harmonica Potatoes
recipes.name: harmonica_potatoes
preparation: Peel potatoes
Slice each potato putting a spoon under
Wrap each potato in foil and bake for 15 minutes
Slice ham, add salt, pepper, 1 tablespoon of oil, and stir everything
Sauce: mix curry and oil
In 15 minutes take potatoes out of the oven, distribute ham in cuts, add sauce
Bake for 15 minutes more
Distribute sliced cheese in the rest of cuts and bake for 10 minutes more

recipes.title: Macaroni with Cheese
recipes.name: macaroni_with_cheese
preparation: Cook macaroni
Grate cheese
Sauce: melt butter in a stew-pan, add flour, stirring thoroughly all the time
In 2 minutes add milk, cook until thickened
Add spices and cheese, and stir
Mix sauce with macaroni

recipes.title: Rice with Garlic
recipes.name: rice_with_garlic
preparation: Boil rice
Cut garlic into small pieces and fry it
Add rice, eggs, green onions
Fry for 10 minutes more

recipes.title: Potatoes 'Romanoff'
recipes.name: potatoes_romanoff
preparation: Mix potatoes, onion, 225g cheese, salt, pepper and sour-cream in a large bowl
Lay out potato substance in a baking pan
Sprinkle the remaining part of cheese over
Bake for 25-30 minutes

recipes.title: Potatoes with Mushrooms in Sour-cream
recipes.name: potatoes_with_mushrooms_in_sour-cream
preparation: Peel and slice potatoes
Cut onion into small pieces, add flour and fry in olive oil
Cut mushrooms and fry them apart from onion
Lay potatoes out in a baking pan
Add mushrooms, onion, spices and sour-cream
Stir everything and bake for 40 minutes

recipes.title: Cottage Cheese Sweets
recipes.name: cottage_cheese_sweets
preparation: Whisk cottage cheese using blender
Add sugar, vanillin, cookie crumbs and nuts, and stir
Make balls and roll them in grated chocolate crumbs
Before serving chill sweets in the fridge for an hour

recipes.title: Caramel
recipes.name: caramel
preparation: Put sugar into frying pan and start cooking it over medium heat until it melts completely and becomes golden
Remove frying pan from heat and little by little add milk constantly stirring the substance
Add vanillin and a pinch of salt, and stir
Heat the substance one more time over small heat, but don't allow it to boil
After add butter, and stir

recipes.title: Cookies 'Bonjour'
recipes.name: bonjour_cookies
preparation: Whisk eggs with sugar, add sour-cream, baking soda and salt. Stir everything thoroughly
Add flour and knead dough that doesn't stick to your hands
Roll out the dough to about 5mm thick
Using a glass cut small circles out
Put 2 or 3 cherries on each circle and make balls
Sprinkle baking pan with flour and put balls on it
Bake in oven for about 30 minutes

recipes.title: Jelly Gummies
recipes.name: jelly_gummies
preparation: Pour juice into a small pan
Add gelatine and leave for a couple of minutes
When gelatine swells, stir
Put the pan over middle heat for gelatine to melt completely and for juice to become denser
Add honey
Pour the substance into molds and chill for 2-3 hours

recipes.title: Chocolate Braunie
recipes.name: chocolate_braunie
preparation: Melt butter, add sugar, cocoa, vanillin, eggs and flour and stir everything thoroughly
Grease baking pan with butter. Bake until set

recipes.title: Coconut Cookies
recipes.name: coconut_cookies
preparation: Whisk eggs with sugar
Add coconut flakes and stir
Add flour with baking soda and vinegar, stir again
Put dough in fridge for 30 minutes
Form cookies out of dough and bake for about 15 minutes

recipes.title: Jelly on Milk
recipes.name: jelly_on_milk
preparation: Mix 100ml milk with gelatine
Boil until gelatine melts completely
Remove from heat, add the remaining part of milk, sugar or honey
Stir, pour into molds, chill for 25 minutes

recipes.title: Oat Cookies
recipes.name: oat_cookies
preparation: Put butter and sugar into a bowl and crumple them with a fork
Use a mixer to get homogeneous substance
Add eggs, oat flakes, nuts etc., flour, and stir
Make balls, deep them in flour
Bake for 15 minutes

recipes.title: Milk Cookies
recipes.name: milk_cookies
preparation: Whisk butter with sugar
Add an egg, milk, baking soda, vinegar, and stir everything
Add flour, and knead the elastic dough
Roll out the dough to about 7-10mm thick
Form cookies out of the dough
Bake for 15 minutes

recipes.title: Banana Cookies
recipes.name: banana_cookies
preparation: Crumple bananas with oat flakes, stir
Add nuts, raisins, chocolate, cinnamon
Bake for 15 minutes

recipes.title: Cookies 'Madlen'
recipes.name: cookies_madlen
preparation: Melt butter a bit, add eggs and sugar
Whisk everything with a hand mixer
Add flour and lemon juice, stir thoroughly
Put the dough into molds for cookies
Bake for 12-15 minutes

recipes.title: Cookies 'Coffee Grains'
recipes.name: coffee_grains_cookies
preparation: Melt coffee in hot milk
Add butter, sugar, fresh cream and cocoa, and stir everything
Then add flour and knead dough
Form coffee beans out of the dough
Bake for 12-15 minutes

recipes.title: Cookies 'Guests at the Threshold'
recipes.name: cookies_guests_at_the_threshold
preparation: Mix flour, sugar, butter, yolks and lemon peels in a bowl
Stir ingredients to homogeneity
Knead dough for 10 minutes for it to become elastic
Form cookies and bake for 10 minutes

recipes.title: Cookies 'Mushrooms'
recipes.name: cookies_mushrooms
preparation: Crumple butter and sugar in a bowl
Add an egg and whisk
Add flour, baking soda and vinegar, and knead dough
Wrap the dough in foil and put into fridge for 40 minutes
Form balls out of the dough at size of a walnut
Using a bottleneck, put into cocoa, get the form of a mushroom out of dough balls
Bake for 20 minutes

recipes.title: Apple Strudel
recipes.name: apple_strudel
preparation: Knead soft dough out of flour, sunflower oil and water
Wrap the dough in foil and put it in warm place for half an hour
Ð¡ut apples and nuts in small pieces
Put sugar and 2 tablespoons of water in frying pan (= caramel)
Add apples, nuts and cinnamon
Caramelize for 10-15 minutes over small heat
Roll out the dough so that it becomes translucent
Lay out the stuffing on the dough, roll it into strudel
Bake for 25 minutes
Pour fresh cream on strudel and bake for 15 minutes more

recipes.title: Puff Pastry
recipes.name: puff_pastry
preparation: Mix flour and butter, add yolk and sour-cream
Knead dough and put it into the fridge for an hour
Roll the dough out, cut triangles out
Put white and sugar into different bowls
Dip every triangle into white and sugar
Bake for 10 minutes

recipes.title: Baked Chocolate Cake
recipes.name: baked_chocolate_cake
preparation: Mix butter, sugar, egg, vanillin and milk, stir everything
Add flour, cocoa powder, baking soda + vinegar and salt, stir again
Lay the dough out in a mold
Bake until set

recipes.title: Cottage Cheese Cake
recipes.name: cottage_cheese_cake
preparation: Mix cottage cheese with eggs, sour-cream and butter in one bowl
Mix flour, sugar, baking soda + vinegar and salt in another bowl
Combine 2 sets of ingredients
Pour the dough in a mold
Bake for 35-45 minutes

recipes.title: Cottage Cheese Dessert
recipes.name: cottage_cheese_dessert
preparation: Mix cottage cheese with sour-cream, add sugar
Pour a glass of water into a saucepan, add gelatine, leave for 10 minutes
Then cook over small heat until gelatine melts completely, stir constantly
Pour gelatine in cottage cheese dough, stir thoroughly
Lay fruits or berries out on the bottom of a mold, pour gelatine substance
Put into the fridge for 2 hours

recipes.title: Cake with Melting Stuffing
recipes.name: cake_with_melting_stuffing
preparation: Melt chocolate, add butter, stir
Add powdered sugar, stir again
Add eggs, yolks, flour and vanillin, and whisk
Pour the dough into molds and bake for 6-12 minutes
Decorate with ice-cream and serve
